items.sentence: I was very tired when I got home last night.
He showed me the manuscript of his new play.
How do I know if a girl is interested in me?
I didn\'t tell Tom I couldn\'t speak French.
I went to see my uncle, but he wasn\'t home.
Do you think I don\'t know what\'s going on?
What makes you think Tom would ever do that?
What percentage of marriages end in divorce?
What time do you usually get up on Saturday?
We weren\'t able to persuade Tom to do that.
We\'ll have plenty of time to do that later.
We\'re always busy at this time of the year.
I think you\'re the only one who needs help.
I thought I could help Tom, but I couldn\'t.
Tom didn\'t understand what Mary was saying.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to play with his kids.
Tom didn\'t want his friends to see him cry.
Tom didn\'t want to be a lawyer or a doctor.
Tom didn\'t want to deal with what happened.
Tom stole some old coins from Mary\'s house.
